product.loyalty_lion__hint_text:
Reward Points

Earn 1 point for every **cart.currency.symbol**1 spent with our rewards programme, Me&Medik8. Simply create an account to join. Collect points every time you shop and redeem them for rewards, including money off future purchases.

You can also enjoy lots of exclusive benefits from secret promotions, free shipping and a gift on your birthday.
product.loyalty_lion__signup_html: Join Me&Medik8 Rewards to earn points when you shop this product. Log In or Sign Up

hero.ingredients_disclaimer: *Although we try our best to ensure this list of ingredients is accurate there may be product upgrades from time to time, or slight variants between different regions based on local laws, meaning the only definitive ingredient list is that which is printed on the product packaging.
